1.title: Scope of Personal Data Processing
1.text: We process personal data of our users only to the extent necessary to provide a functional website, our content and services. The processing of personal data of our users takes place regularly only with the user's consent. An exception applies in cases where prior consent cannot be obtained for factual reasons and the processing of the data is permitted by law.

legalBasis.vitalInterests: Processing may also be necessary to protect vital interests of the data subject or another natural person.

specialCategories.title: Legal Bases Under Art. 6(1) GDPR
specialCategories.text: We process personal data based on the following legal grounds:
items: The data subject has given consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR)
Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR)
Processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR)
Processing is necessary to protect vital interests (Art. 6(1)(d) GDPR)
Processing is necessary for the purposes of legitimate interests (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR)

section3.title: 4. Provision of Website and Log Files

description.title: Description of Data Processing
description.text: Each time our website is accessed, our system automatically collects data and information from the accessing computer system:
items: IP address of the requesting computer
Name and URL of the retrieved file
Website from which access is made (referrer URL)
Name of your internet service provider
description.storage: This data is stored in our system's log files. This data is not stored together with other personal data of the user.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.text: The temporary storage of data and log files is based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in ensuring the functionality and security of our website.

purpose.title: Purpose of Processing
purpose.text: The temporary storage of the IP address is necessary to enable delivery of the website to the user's computer. The storage in log files ensures the functionality and optimization of the website, as well as the security of our information technology systems.

duration.title: Duration of Storage
duration.text: The data is deleted as soon as it is no longer necessary to achieve the purpose of its collection. For data collection for website provision, this is when the respective session ends. Log files are deleted after 7 days.

objection.title: Possibility of Objection
objection.text: The collection of data for website provision and storage in log files is essential for the operation of the website. Consequently, there is no possibility for users to object.

description.text: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are text files stored in or by the internet browser on the user's computer system.
description.purposes: We use cookies to make our website more user-friendly. Some elements of our website require that the accessing browser can be identified even after a page change.

cookieInfo.text: The following data is stored and transmitted in the cookies:

legalBasis.text: The legal basis for processing personal data using technically necessary cookies is Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. For other cookies, we process data based on your consent according to Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR.

duration.text: Cookies are stored on the user's computer and transmitted to our site. Therefore, you as a user have full control over the use of cookies. You can disable or restrict the transmission of cookies by changing your internet browser settings.

details.text: You can configure your browser settings according to your preferences and decline the acceptance of third-party cookies or all cookies. Please note that you may not be able to use all features of this website if cookies are disabled.
details.additional: We use a cookie consent management tool that allows you to give or withdraw your consent for different categories of cookies.

description.doubleOptIn: We use a double opt-in procedure for newsletter subscriptions. After registering, you will receive a confirmation email with a link to confirm your subscription. This confirmation is required to prevent abuse of email addresses.
description.tracking: Our newsletter may contain tracking pixels that allow us to analyze if and when you open an email and which links you click on. This data is used to optimize our newsletter content.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.text: The processing of your email address for newsletter delivery is based on your consent according to Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR. The tracking of newsletter usage is based on our legitimate interests according to Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR to optimize our communication.

purpose.text: We use your email address to send you our newsletter. Additional data is used to personalize the newsletter and prevent misuse of our services. The tracking data helps us understand how our newsletters are used and how we can improve them.

duration.title: Duration of Storage
duration.text: We store your data for as long as you are subscribed to our newsletter. You can unsubscribe at any time using the link in the newsletter or by contacting us.
duration.deletion: After unsubscribing, your email address will be stored in a blocklist to ensure we respect your unsubscribe request. Other data will be deleted unless legal retention periods require continued storage.

recipient.title: Recipients of Data
recipient.text: For sending newsletters, we use specialized newsletter service providers who act as our processors under Art. 28 GDPR. We have concluded data processing agreements with these providers to ensure the protection of your data.
